title: Mangling Cultures: Conflict, Dissonance and Interpretation in Modern Language Studies
abstract: From medieval epic and hagiography to modern poetry and cinema and from Central Europe to Brazil, this collection of essays, arising from a graduate day conference, explores questions of conflict and violence in a range of fields from within modern language and literary studies
